name: The Iron Dragon Fist Foot Sword Fight Might Tournament
name_original: The Iron Dragon Fist Foot Sword Fight Might Tournament
description:
This is the ultimate battle.  Welcome to the Iron Dragon Fist Foot Sword Fight Might Tournament!

From across the Apocalypse Realms, brings the greatest fighters to compete in the greatest challenge a warrior can face. So far, only two challengers have arrived early.

 The Plague Doctor, in his ever growing quest to find toilet paper, has wandered in between realms and has unknowingly nominated himself the champion of the Realm TP.

From another realm, named only as Realm 8, comes the Mutant. In the universe that the Mutant came from, it is the strongest creature. Correction, it is the only creature as it has dominated its way through the realm, slaughtering every being that existed. No one knows the creature's origin, but its goals are clear: Dominate and Destroy.

Control Scheme:Keyboard:

Light Attack: T

Heavy Attack: Y

Block: U

Special Move: G

Movement: WASD

Gamepad:

Light Attack: X/Square

Heavy Attack: Y/ Triangle

Block: A/X

Special: B/ Circle

*This game was made as course project

**Note: This game can support multiple controllers or keyboards, for up to 2 players. If there is only one player, an AI fighter will be generated
